EmailTemplate.name: RE: MBO Partners (1337178343.0)
EmailTemplate.subject: RE: MBO Partners (1337178343.0)
EmailTemplate.textOnly: - - - 110 Clean Clean false false false EN-US X-NONE X-NONE Hi Jeff, The last step for MBO sending me a copy of your completed I-9. You can find the I-9 form in your enrollment documents; you will sign/date section 1 and a local notary will sign/date section 2 ( there will be instructions on how to complete this form in your enrollment documents as well.) You can send this back to me via email (I dont need a hard copy.) I will also need you to send me a copy of your US passport (you can just take a picture with your phone and email that to me.) I have attached an updated net cash showing 2k per day. Please feel free to reach out to me with any questions. Thanks!Sara ___________________________________SARA CONDEConsultant Services Advisor MBO Partners t: 703.793.6028f: 703.793.6068e: sconde@mbopartners.comw: www.mbopartners.com Notice: This email and any files transmitted with it are confidential. They are intended solely for the use of the individual addressed. If you have received this email in error please notify postmaster@mbopartners.com and permanently delete the e-mail and files. From: <mailto:sconde@mbopartners.com> Jeff Sheftic [mailto:jeffsheftic@yahoo.com] Sent: Wednesday, May 16, 2012 10:02 AM To: Sara Conde Subject: Re: MBO Partners Sara,Am I all set with MBO? CAn you run the numbers a a 2,000 a day rate? From: Sara Conde <sconde@mbopartners.com <mailto:sconde@mbopartners.com>> To: Jeff Sheftic <jeffsheftic@yahoo.com>; "mike.crist@broadridge.com" <mike.crist@broadridge.com <mailto:jeffsheftic@yahoo.com>> Sent: Tuesday, May 15, 2012 6:00 PM Subject: RE: MBO Partners Hi Mike, It was so nice speaking with you today. As we discussed Boradridge will reach out to Jeff to negotiate a daily rate and once that is confirmed Boradridge will reach out to MBO to finalize any needed paperwork. Thanks!Sara ___________________________________SARA CONDEConsultant Services Advisor MBO Partners t: 703.793.6028f: 703.793.6068e: sconde@mbopartners.comw: www.mbopartners.com Notice: This email and any files transmitted with it are confidential. They are intended solely for the use of the individual addressed. If you have received this email in error please notify postmaster@mbopartners.com <mailto:sconde@mbopartners.com> and permanently delete the e-mail and files. From: Sara Conde Sent: Monday, May 14, 2012 5:31 PM To: 'Jeff Sheftic'; 'mike.crist@broadridge.com' Subject: RE: MBO Partners Hi Mike, Hope you had nice weekend, I just wanted to follow up on my email bellow. I have attached the contract we have with Broadridge and if you follow the link below you will be directed towards our SOW: http://info.mbopartners.com/rs/mbo/images/MBO_Exec_SOW.pdf <http://info.mbopartners.com/rs/mbo/images/MBO_Exec_SOW.pdf> Please let me know if you have any questions or if you need any additional information from MBO. Once we have the SOW completed, signed, and returned via email we will be able to activate Jeffs account and get him set up to bill. Thank you, Sara ___________________________________SARA CONDEConsultant Services Advisor MBO Partners t: 703.793.6028f: 703.793.6068e: sconde@mbopartners.comw: www.mbopartners.com Notice: This email and any files transmitted with it are confidential. They are intended solely for the use of the individual addressed. If you have received this email in error please notify postmaster@mbopartners.com <mailto:sconde@mbopartners.com> and permanently delete the e-mail and files. From: Sara Conde Sent: Thursday, May 10, 2012 12:49 PM To: 'Jeff Sheftic'; mike.crist@broadridge.com <mailto:mike.crist@broadridge.com> Subject: MBO Partners Hi Mike, So nice to meet you via email, attached is the MSA that we have in place with Broadridge. All we would need to bring on Jeff is for Boradridge to complete and sign the attached SOW so we have the specific details of this engagement. Pelase let me know if you have any additional questions. On behalf of all of MBO we look forward to working with your firm again. Best regards,Sara___________________________________SARA CONDEConsultant Services Advisor MBO Partners t: 703.793.6028f: 703.793.6068e: sconde@mbopartners.comw: www.mbopartners.com Notice: This email and any files transmitted with it are confidential. From: Jeff Sheftic [mailto:jeffsheftic@yahoo.com] <mailto:sconde@mbopartners.com> Sent: Thursday, May 10, 2012 8:33 AM To: Sara Conde; mike.crist@broadridge.com <mailto:mike.crist@broadridge.com> Subject: Good morning Sara. I have added Mike Crist to this email as he has offered to assist in making sure that any agreements between MBO and Broadridge covers his division. Can you send to him a copy of the current agreement between your two firms for his review? I greatly appreciate your assistance,Jeff </h
